content: **knitted hoodie hat/balaclava in drops melody piece is knitted bottom up in stocking stitch with vents in the sides ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ml-091 yarn group d ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** one-size piece measures approx circumference 80 cm height 50 cm **materials** drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 150 g colour 01 off white **needles** drops circular needle size 6 mm length 60 cm drops circular needle size 5 mm length 60 cm **knitting gauge** 14 stitches in width and 16 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
